values:
New journal.

__if__only__


Addith me. For I have already added you. Dumbasses.

Day 1:

I beat the Mario Brothers game.

Thank you.

Alright so I'm at school and I am bored because it's lunch time and usually me and Grace hang out but today she isn't here because she is gone to Sidney because her sister has this gymnastics tornament or something. I don't know. I'm grounded because I skipped.

I was going to go and find Jeremy today but I'm lazy and plus I don't want to look like an idiot.

My mom is a fucking bitch and for my fucking mistakes I have to make other people suffer too. 

I cannot go to the Buddywhatshisname and the other fellers concert. Because I skipped school and my teacher just called. 

I want to die.

Now I can't go to Justins party. Another thing I have fucked up for Paula.

And I can't go on a date with Gabriel. Another person I have fucked up plans with.

What the fuck is wrong with me?!

There was a possible gas leak at our school so there was NO school today ^^.

Athena didn't come for me and Jd this morning so we decided to walk...at like 8 lol cuz thats when band starts...yes...well anywho we were walking along and we see Athena in her car drive by...and then we see Kathleen, a person from our band, drive by and then we saw Scott, another person in our band...and then Athena came by and picked us up and told us that there was a possible gas leak in our school and that there was no school. ^^. TEHE!

Me and Jd wathched movies all day ^^. It was grand. We watched Zoolander and Hitch, his dad pirated it haha. YUP! 

Me and Gabriel are going to the movies this weekend! *Squeels* Yup. I think we are. Haha. Well, he invited me so if I can get there (probably on bus) then I shall be able to go. Haha. I can't wait.

It's Damiens birthday today, so happy 17th birthday ^^, even though he doesn't read this...I'm still giving him a shout out anyways. Haha.

I have rented Napoleon Dynamite (yes again!) and I have not had a chance to watch it >.< But I shall do it soon.

I was supposed to go to the mall today with Grace after school but I guess that didn't happen since there was a possible gas leak. I hope it hasn't cleared up tommorrow. Which might be a horrible thing to say about my school but I just don't want to go.

No band this morning cuz I can't find a drive, and my mom is like spazzing at me because she wants me to take a taxi over. NO. I hate taking taxis and I shouldn't have to pay for band. Thats right. So I'm just not going.

Alright so I got a new cell phone. It's not really new, it's old cause it's buddys cell phone that sold us it...Sounds confusing but it's really not...Yeah...It's not even a flip phone *cries*. I guess I will have to go in and see the security guard today and ask him how everything is going. I want to die.

Okay so heres what happened:


Alex took my vagina and put it on his shelf. Then a guy named Cornelius came along and trade Alex a popsicle for the vagina. Alex accepted. I traded my chicken to Bryan for a llama. Then. I traded Alex my llama for a puddle and two popsicle sticks.

Thats right. I think that's how it went.

YUP.

Wow, I don't really have much to put in this anymore do I.

I'm leaving now. Bye.

Alright. So last night me and Krista had a sleepover and we snuck out.
Oh yeah. And we just walked around, it was grand. Pictures!!

Yup.

Ceasar Salad in a bottle. WICKED AWESOME! Haha me and Ryan come up with the coolest things. Tehe.

I'm at Kristas house and we are having a ball ^^. Haha we took amazing pictures thank you very much but I shall have to get them from her later because she took them on her digital camera except that I have to put it on Photobucket and all so thats cool so I shall do it later.

She has a boyfriend! *Is proud fo her* And I actually like him this time. Hehe. One of her only boyfriends that I have actually liked. His name is Brian and we are hanging out with him right now. 

We watched Shawn of the Dead tonight ((with Brian)) and it was grand.

I have a chicken.

Ta ta for tea time.

HOLLA!

Kay, well now that Krista has read the post where I had a bad day she's probably pissed at me. I don't know how she got my lj link. Whatever...

Okay, well today is Easter. And I have not recieved my chocolate yet because there is no one up except for me. >.< 

In the meantime I went to go see my cousins, Jennifer, baby last night and she is sooo cute!! Her name is Lauren Grace. I love it. <3

I found this rather amusing. We went to go pick up Sharlyn last night because she was upset about something...or something...and so when we were at the liquor store, as soon as my dad got out of the car she just blurts out "So do you do drugs?!" Hahahha. It was grand. Gotta love Sharlyn.

I'm bored. And somebody has to tell me how to make my lj private so that other people can't read it. Such as the stupid panzy ass person who keeps saying that I shouldn't complain about my cell phone. Bite my ass.

Alright so I have decided that I am probably not going to finish Harry Potter this weekend. Considering I didn't even get to page 200 yesterday haha. 

My chicken has bitten Gabriels penis.

Thats right. You heard me.

Okay. Well. I'm off now I think. I think I might go play Neopets. ^^. Haha. *LOSER!* Thank you. And good night. Oh yeah, and just in case that Alex didn't see my other post. I wuv Alex. *Pets his face* <3

Alright, so my crazy aunt is here and I am hungry.

I have decided that by the time this day is done I shall have to be past 250 in Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire ^^.

Janet, Meghan and her boyfriend are soon to be arriving.

My chicken has just bit Gabriels penis.

I think I have Paula's watch on. *Ponders*

I don't really have anything to say.

Alex has kitteny soft hair. I don't know where the hell that came from.

You all smell.

Good night, and Merry Easter, thats right you heard me. Merry Easter. And a Happy Christmas to you too.

38. Time you finished this e-mail: 12:18
39. Which came first--chicken or egg?? Your mom.

Alright so it's like 12 in the morning (or night, depends on how you look at it) and I'm totally bored. I have decided that I want to read the fourth Harry Potter book this weekend, before it ends, counting Monday. Haha. I watched the third Harry Potter movie tonight with Krista and I realized that I hadn't remembered much from the fourth and the fifth books. So I have decicded to read them.

Insiders from tonight: 

"Krista, you smell like cake"
"I have a homosexual camera"

Which the camera reminds me that I took a picture of the full moon. Made me happy. Hehe. I just wish that Krista and I could have had a sleepover tonight on a full moon so that we could have read up on our witchcraft stuff. Humm. Next time my dear next time.

So tommorrow my crazy aunt from hell is coming over. Oh dear god. She annoys me sometimes. Okay well pretty much all the time. She tells me on how to do my hair ("Remember Erin Mae, brush from the bottom up!") and she comments on how I do my make up. Yes, I don't mind if your telling me that you know oh you could blend your colours here a little bit <<example<< or something like that, but she tells me that I'm doing it all wrong and I just want to strangle her. The night of the concert (Billy Talent) she told me that my make up looked hideous, and suggested that I should go wash up before I left. Bitch. My make up was grand and I was commented several times and it was all thanks to Krista because she did it for me. And I worked my ass off trying to get my hair washed with my damn make up on so I was pretty damn proud haha. Alright so my mom told me a story of how she was in Ottawa in our old house and she was drinking and back then everyone smoked and all so they had candles lit, and she was bending her head over and she caught her hair on fire. HAHA. Made me laugh. 
My mom: "Emma your hair is on fire!!" 
My aunt Emma: "Oh go away thats nothing!"
Haha. Thats funny, and they put it out and all but the embers must have still been hot in her hair or something because it caught fire again! Haha. Well, she also caught me and Nick making out. But she didn't tell my parents or nothing. She just knocked on the wall whenever she was about to come downstairs again. Haha. It was grand.

Anywho, I have this quiz I am going to do, and possibly another one. This is stolen from my Tommy dearest:

02.Ran away: No.
03.Pictured your crush naked: I don't have one.

which is better ?

16.FLOWERS OR CANDY: Candy

the last time -

28.HAD A GREAT TIME WITH THE OPPOSITE SEX: I don't really hang out with much guys.

what is -
29.YOUR GOOD LUCK CHARM: Nill.
30.PERSON YOU HATE MOST: Kelli Moore.
31. THE BEST THING THAT HAS HAPPENED TO YOU TODAY: Went to a movie with my mother and hung out with Krista and went to lunch.

favorites -
32.COLOR: Black and red.

Hello.

Krista is coming over tonight.

And people are reading my journal that they shouldn't be and putting bad comments. Tell me, why shouldn't I be fuckin' complainin about my cell phone? Should I be happy about it? Well soooorrrryyyy to disappoint you but I am not. So fuck you.

Alright so now that that is out of my system. Me and my mother went to see a movie today ^^. We went to see Guess Who, I think thats what it's called. It's with Ashton Kutcher and stuff in it. It was really good Haha. I enjoyed it. And before that me and my mother went out to lunch at Pizza Hut, in which we didn't eat everything because it was like a large of everything and I was full after my third pieve of pizza, second plate of ceasar salad, and 5th breadstick >.< Hahah.

In the meantime I have orange juice and it is really good. I have been drinking a lot of it lately. I think I might have mentioned that in one of my earlier posts. Ah well when you update this much your bound to repeat somethin.

After I came home from the movies I went to sleep...Yes again. I slept right through till 6 o'clock, missing supper >.< Oh well I wasn't that hungry anyway from that big meal I had. Haha. 

That is all I have wished to say right now. I shall have to go play some more neopets. Thank you and good night.

Wow...I just slept for 11 hours. ^^. I guess I needed the sleep...

I'm having my Easter dinner on Saturday, as my dad is leaving on Sunday so it shall be good. And I can't wait. Haha. I wonder if that means that we get to have Easter too...? I shall have to ask...More like beg and plead. Hehe. Haha. 

I missed Saved By The Bell. :( And it would have been the college years too. But the Smufs come on Monday so I can watch them! ^^ ^^ ^^ ^^ I have waited all my life! Okay not really I have seen them before. And I tried to download them. But it came up with this really wierd one...It was like The Smurf Show and she kept saying "My smurf itches...and I need to Master...I mean smurferbate..." It was scary and disturbing.

Alright so nothing to do today because nothing is open 'course. And nothign to do tommorrow because we are having Easter dinner. I vote we stay in our pajamas all day Erin. I think we should do that too Erin.

<3

I'm leaving now. Ta.
My mom took me to Winners, and bought be underwear. That is all I wish to say. Oh yeah. I wuv Alex. <3

Fuck Krista. Fuckin' ditch me for a fuckin' guy. Bitch.

As you all can tell I have had a very bad day.

Alright so today is the last day before the Easter weekend...Yay. Chocolate, yummy. Today we are missing the last two periods for a sock hop. It's where you dance and jump around in your socks. Apparently. It sounds like fun, who cares if its lame?! If you guys think it's lame, then you can go fuck yourselves. Haha. No band this morning ^^ But next week I have to go all 4 days in a row >.< But I guess there is a method to his madness. I just haven't found it out yet. Lately I have been drinking a lot of orange juice, and I don't know. I just have been having the craving for orange juice. Darren and Emma broke up, I don't know if I had mentioned that in any of my other posts but I'm kind of glad that they did. Emma does not deserve Darren for she is a whore and cheated on him twice in one night, and you know your a whore when you cheat on your boyfriend with MORGAN!!! EWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW. He is disgusting and I wish to eat his face. Actually you know what?! He's not even good enough for me to eat his face, therefore I shalln't eat his face. Any news about the cell phone? No. Well, I just found out that Jamar, the guy that I am 99.999999% sure that took my phone is in grade 11, which means that he failed grade 10 English. HAHAHA. Sorry. I just had to laugh at him. And if he pulled the phone out in school then the cameras might have caught him and if he doesn't have it now thats okay because he can go buy me a new one. But I don't think my dad has the heart to do that because from what he has heard about him he is poor. I don't give a shit if he's poor. If he's poor he doesn't have to go steal my cell phone, he can go get a job and buy one for himself like all the normal people would do. Fucker. I don't give a shit if he doesn't have the money to buy me a new cell phone, if he gets caught at stealing my cell phone he is paying for the damages. Fuck him. Ew. Alright so Justin's party is not this weekend but the next weekend. I can't wait. Well maybe I can because I will be seeing Nick. And I don't want to see him. Plus he will probably be drunk or whatever. As usual or high, whichever he can get his hands on. Well I am saying this much, he is not getting his hands on me. I need my Paula to go. But I don't know if her dad will let her. Meow?

Alright so they haven't found my cell phone >.< Nor will they ever. Fuckin' thieves. I'm going to seriously beat Jamar. Fucking fuckers. 

Anywho I had a really cool day I suppose. I was going to ask my parents if I could go climbing tonight with my friend Ryan before he goes off to the old Paree, but I decided against it. I don't want them to get mad at me for asking. Thats right they will get mad at me.

So I said that Ryan was going off to Paris. Fucker. Haha. He's going with the french immerision people. He was also on the video announcements but some of him was cut out because the girl asked him what he planned on doing there or why he thinks they should go or something and someone behind the camera mouthed the words "Get Laid" and he burst out laughing. Sadly I didn't see that but I heard about it haha. 

We also had a party for him before he goes away, because he's part of the Youth Health Center and so am I (It sounds lame I know.) but we got cake and stuff. And then he was being really affectionate towards me which kind of scared me. *Pats her hair* I guess I looked perdy today. That and he said he liked my ass *Shrugs* damn guys.

My father picked me up from school today ^^ *Loves him* I hate taking the bus home because it's soooo boring. I'm sorry I don't want to talk to Jeremy and join in on his conversations about video games and shooting people. I want to shoot him myself for god sakes. Haha. He took me to take Kristian's books back, (a little late...sorry) and The Anchorman (movie) and he was going to take me to Winners but he might be taking me out after supper since my mom will be gone out. Haha. Oh yeah he took me to the recycle depot so I got money! 10$! Haha. It doesn't sound like a lot but I like it. Haha.

Anywho. What else happened today?

Oh yeah we had this stupid Racism thing today which was totally boring and it was last period so I suppose that everyone was just restless to get out of school. But, like Lori mentioned in her lj, everyone was black. I mean racism isn't all about black people. God. I'm not racist and I'm not trying to make any racist comments but do we, white people, have to take all of the blame for racism!? I know it's still going on in this world but I mean why do we have to suffer through this. More black people are racist against white people. Thats my oppinion and many other peoples opinnions as well. And if people cannot recognize that then they can go to hell Haha. That is all I wish to say about that topic.

Oh yeah, during the assembly the girl said "Your parents all chose your name wisely!" and then I whispered to Grace "My mom was drunk" Hahaha. It was grand.

Okay well right now that is all I wish to say. So I'm going to go now. And now that I have had a good day, I feel good. Unfortunately Paula doesn't feel that great. So a shout out to PJ- I WUV YOU!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! man thats a lot of exclamation marks. Haha. I love you this much! *Holds out hands as far as she can go* Haha.

HOLLA!
Well. I get what I deserve. My phone was stolen yesterday. Fuckers. I cried. er...A lot... But now it's pay back time. That is all I wished to say.

Well, the last day of March Break was total and udder bullshit. It sucked. Me and Paula were going to this gym thing and we thought it was an arcade and then we invited Damien and Gabriel to go, as you all know, and it sucked. They couldn't get in for free and then they had to leave. Oh my it sucked. Yes.

Well. Gabriel isn't mad but Damien is because he is a dickface and I want to eat him. That is all I wish to say on this subject. >.<

People are here. Ruth called me on my cell and was like "Yes I'm coming to your house" Um...Okay...Yes, Ruth is my mothers friend. And her daughtor is here and she is annoying and I wish to strangle her. The one time that my Ares works, and I was downloading some good songs there guys (I've got a lovely bunch of coconuts deedle dee!) and then the little witch goes over and turns the light switch off which is connected to my computer. So, naturally the computer turns off. Erg. I thought the power had gone out but then I saw the light next to me and felt like an idiot. Haha. It was grand.

Me and Paula were playing Halo 2 together today. It made us happier, after this whole brawl with Damien and Gabriel. Okay with Damien. Yes. I killed her multiple times and yes I killed myself (by accident! How was I to know there was a lake after the edge of the cliff?!) and yes, we did have fun. 

And then we played Skip Bo. I think I won. I can't remember. Eh. Oh well. It's not important. But it was fun too. Paula flushled the cards wrong and they went everywheres haha.

And we had left Halo 2 on the screen to go upstairs for supper and later we came downstairs and it was still on, so Paula's dad comes downstairs "Theres nothing on tv" hahaha. It was grand. 

Anywho, I have to go now because the brat is reading this. Bye.
I hate everyone and everything. Including myself. Thank you, that is all I wished to say.

Why hello. 

Alright, so last night was pretty wierd. I was talking to Damiens brother and he seems nice...So we might be going to the arcade together ^^. But things probably aren't going to turn out the way I want them to. They never do. :(  >.< He's the same age as me so it's all good haha. And his name is Gabriel. I can't even say his name. It's prounced like your going to say babe but with a G at the beginning. But I always pronounce it Gab-riel. I'll just call him Gabe haha.

Last night me and Paula watched Monty Python and the Holy Grail, and it was grand. Except for the fact that I fell asleep...Haha...Shut up...Yes, well. I saw all the parts that I wanted to see haha. Uh huh...

"I found a wrapper! I found 50 cent!"

Yes. Me and my stupid words hahaha, you had to be there really.

Alright so today wasn't too bad. Me and Paula went to the mall, alone. Yes. It was quite boring because we had nothing to do there and we just you know sat around on the stuffed animals in Toys R Us all day haha. It was grand.

Tim called me. Fucker. He basically complained the whole time about how my parents are overprotective. I just want to smack his face and be like "Listen fucker, they're overprotective for a reason, so that I don't go out with 19 year old fuckers like you" and then hang up the phone. And I will do it. And he said that he was going to call me back tonight so that should be good. God, I hate over obsessive guys.

Me and Paula are going to watch Monty Python and the Holy Grail soon after we watch this stujpid movie my mother bought the other day. I'll make sure I fall asleep during it ^.~ Haha. Thats loverly.

*Loves Paula*

Yup and she is staying again here overnight ^^ *Feels loved*







LOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOK PICTURES OF ME BEING RETARTED!!!!!!.! Thats right.

This is all I wished to say. Thank you and good night....Fuckers.

Alright so Paula came down last night. I was stuck in the house all day so me and my dad went for a drive, and then while we were in Sears she texted me and then I called her and told her that my dad would come and get her since we were already half way there. So yeah. And then we went to get snacks and there are a lot of things that came out of our mouths last night that were quite amusing.

"Well we HAVE to get something SALTY!" Hahaha. Alright to explain this we were in Superstore and we were picking out Chips and she was just like "Well we HAVE to have something salty" and then we just burst out laughing haha.

And then she took something down, I can't remember what it was, but it was a bag of some sort of chips or cheesies, and I didn't want it so I was trying to put it back but I was throwing it and then this manager guy or some guy that worked there saw me and just laughed, I walked away. Haha. It was grand.

And then at my house.
Me: *Drops a hickery stick on the floor*
Paula: "Whats the difference if something is on the ground for five seconds or five minutes? It's still in the same place"
Me: "What if it runs away?!"
Paula: "Yes, it's just going to evolve legs and walk away" 

Haha. It was funnier when it happened, and we actually got pictures in our head of a hickery stick evolving legs and arms and running away, while flailing his arms. Yes we're freaks. Leave us alone. Haha.

Yes.
That is all for right now.
Ta.































































Merry Christmas















































Ta.

Alright well, I'm at home. By myself. Well, with my parents and it sucks because they are telling me to do things and I don't want to do anything because I might be hanging out with Alex and Kaitlyn today. Which would be fun but I can't hang out with them if I'm out somewhere now can I?! And I'm having a great time in my pajamas, switching computers and such and text messaging Paula and Damien. So there parents *sticks out tongue at them* Haha. That was grand. Yes. Well. I'm bored again, I think I might go play some games now on Noepets. Ts.
